title:
N
        4-Allylcytidine: a new nucleoside analogue for RNA labelling and chemical sequencing
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,225-235
DOI: 10.1039/D3CB00189J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tengwei Li, Xiao Shu, Minsong Gao, Chenyang Huang, Ting Li, Jie Cao, Xiner Ying, Donghong Liu, Jianzhao Liu
N 4-Allylcytidine, a new nucleoside analogue, can be applied to label RNA via various fashions and then be post-identified at base resolution by iodination-mediated chemical sequencing.
